name: torrent-snag
description: Chrome extension to detect torrent and magnet links and send them to qBittorrent

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy && npm run validate
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean && npm run copy && echo '✅ Development build complete'
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && npm run copy && echo '✅ Production build complete'
scripts.copy: mkdir -p dist && cp -r src/* dist/ && echo '📁 Files copied to dist/'
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist/ && echo '🧹 Cleaned dist directory'
scripts.validate: echo '🔍 Validating build...' && test -f dist/manifest.json && echo '✅ manifest.json found' && test -f dist/background/background.js && echo '✅ background.js found' && echo '🎉 Basic validation passed!'

author: Blackboard Studios
